output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: No visible CMF number, but this doesn't exclude it from being propaganda.
2. Refers to candidates: Yes, explicitly mentions three presidential candidates: - Elena Lasconi (USR) - Călin Georgescu (Independent) - George Simion (AUR)
3. Addresses wide population: Yes - Paid advertisement with 40,000-45,000 impressions - Public platform (Facebook/Instagram) - Uses hashtags and emotional language to reach wider audience
4. Electoral objective: Yes - Clearly aims to influence voting behavior - Uses strong negative messaging against Lasconi ("neomarxistă", "incompetentă") - Promotes Simion positively ("singurul lider", "luptă pentru români") - Uses campaign-style hashtags (#GeorgeSimionPreședinte)
5. Journalism: No - Lacks journalistic standards - Uses emotional and inflammatory language - No balanced reporting or factual analysis
6. Personal opinion: No - This is a paid, structured campaign message - Uses strategic political messaging - Clear campaign objectives
The post shows clear characteristics of electoral propaganda, targeting multiple presidential candidates with both negative and positive messaging.

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - Directly targets presidential candidates - Uses campaign messaging and hashtags - Paid distribution for wide reach - Clear intent to influence voting behavior - Contains both negative and positive candidate messaging - Uses emotional and polarizing language
conclusion.message-for-police: ZiarulEconomic, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui mesaj de propaganda electorala platit (ID postare 2008908872902760) dupa incheierea perioadei de campanie electorala, respectiv dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024. Postarea reprezinta propaganda electorala evidenta prin atacarea directa a candidatei Elena Lasconi (folosind termeni precum "neomarxistă" si "incompetentă") si promovarea explicita a candidatului George Simion (prin hashtag-ul #GeorgeSimionPreședinte si declaratii precum "singurul lider care poate readuce demnitatea"). Mesajul a fost distribuit contra cost pe platformele Facebook si Instagram, cu un impact estimat intre 40.000 si 45.000 de afisari, demonstrand intentia clara de a influenta comportamentul electoral al unui public larg.
